subject: Boats and Boating
lead_paragraph: LONDON, Jan. 12 (Reuters) — Seven years ago, Dee Caffari swapped life as a physical education teacher to earn her living by diving into the murky waters at Southampton to scrub the bottom of a boat owned by the esteemed British yachtsman Mike Golding.
